channel.title: CVE Feed for Automattic -- WooCommerce
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Automattic -- WooCommerce

item.title: CVE-2021-24323|2024-08-03T19:28:23.704Z -- automattic -- woocommerce
item.description: When taxes are enabled, the "Additional tax classes" field was not properly sanitised or escaped before being output back in the admin dashboard, allowing high privilege users such as admin to use XSS payloads even when the unfiltered_html is disabled

item.title: CVE-2024-22155|2024-08-01T22:35:34.946Z -- automattic -- woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Automattic WooCommerce.This issue affects WooCommerce: from n/a through 8.5.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-35777|2024-07-09T13:57:49.301Z -- automattic -- woocommerce
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements in Output Used by a Downstream Component ('Injection') vulnerability in Automattic WooCommerce allows Content Spoofing.This issue affects WooCommerce: from n/a through 8.9.2.

item.title: CVE-2024-22155|2024-04-07T17:56:05.844Z -- automattic -- woocommerce
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Automattic WooCommerce.This issue affects WooCommerce: from n/a through 8.5.2.
